price: Ɛna Wayε bosome no nhyerεnee wͻ mu, εna Wayε awia no nso kanea?
arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wajaʿala al-qamara fīhinna nūran wajaʿala al-shamsa sirājan
